system.description: The shadiest of all the classes, Assassins see life as expendable and unimportant. Even their own life is trivial, someone will kill them sooner or later. That's life. Life is short and thus Assassins tend to get to the point quickly, literally. Some-what of a martial artist, there is something Zen about the Assassin's way, not unlike the Duelist in that they have strong inner motivation, though care nothing for honor. Assassins try to increase hatred between people in the hopes of creating more job opportunities for themselves. If you're an Assassin, don't think twice about killing someone, care little for your own life and cut to the chase!

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Climbing and Leaping.
You climb at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead climb at normal speed.

overview.base: You leap horizontally at half speed and vertically at quarter speed.
overview.proficient: You instead leap horizontally at normal speed and vertically at half speed.

overview.base: You prepare a 5 foot by 5 foot area. While in this area, you may make a limited improved Hide action.

You become hidden. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your passive sneak ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your passive sneak.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, three-quarters cover, or some other feature which the GM determines is appropriate for being hidden. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay hidden.
system.limitation: You may only Hide in the location you have prepared and you do not get the attribute improvement from this ability. You also do not remain hidden if you leave this location.
